# Docs Definition of Done Template

## Purpose
Ensure product, technical, and user-help documentation are updated before release.

## Required for Every User-Facing Change
- [ ] Product spec updated (or linked)
- [ ] Release notes updated
- [ ] Help content updated (new/changed workflow)
- [ ] Responsible-use guidance reviewed
- [ ] Screenshots updated (if UI changed)
- [ ] Error messages documented with corrective actions

## Required for Technical Changes
- [ ] Architecture/flow diagram updated
- [ ] API or edge function contract documented
- [ ] Environment variables documented
- [ ] Migration and rollback steps documented
- [ ] Monitoring and alerting notes updated

## Review and Ownership
- Product owner review: [ ]
- Engineering owner review: [ ]
- Support/help owner review: [ ]

## Publishing Checklist
- [ ] Docs merged in same PR or linked PR
- [ ] Internal changelog updated
- [ ] User-facing help center published
- [ ] Release communication drafted

## Post-Release Validation
- [ ] Confirm links work in production
- [ ] Track top support tickets for this release
- [ ] Log follow-up docs improvements
